# Caesar

> Caesar is a crypto tax engine for platforms and regulators in Africa. We turn transaction data from exchanges, wallets, and fintechs into tax-ready outputs: user-level tax positions, platform-level VAT and WHT, and compliance reportsâ€”all aligned with Nigerian tax rules.

Caesar is built for organisations, not individual taxpayers. We integrate via API or file upload to calculate crypto tax obligations automatically.

**Key facts:**
- Based in Lagos, Nigeria
- Supports Nigerian tax rules (individual PIT, corporate CIT, VAT, WHT)
- Serves crypto exchanges, wallets, fintechs, and tax authorities
- Pricing: annual contracts starting at $5,000/year for platforms
- Contact: hello@caesar.africa

**What we calculate:**
- User tax positions: capital gains and income from crypto trading, staking, rewards, airdrops, NFTs
- Platform obligations: VAT on fees, WHT on service payments, crypto-related profits
- Tax outputs updated when Nigerian rules change

## Product

- [Product overview](https://www.caesar.africa/product): How Caesar works, data flow, and tax calculation process
- [For platforms](https://www.caesar.africa/platforms): Benefits for exchanges, wallets, and fintechs
- [For governments](https://www.caesar.africa/governments): Regulatory analytics and compliance monitoring
- [Pricing](https://www.caesar.africa/pricing): Plans for platforms (Entry, Growth, Enterprise) and governments
